name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SDI Auth Bridge for Adobe Launch

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables Adobe Launch Extension views to make Adobe IO API calls using the credentials of the currently logged in user.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The sole purpose of this extension is to enable Adobe Launch Extension views to make calls to the Adobe IO API on behalf of the user.
It is a necessary companion to any Search Discovery Adobe Launch Extension that needs to access the Adobe IO API.
